caption:
This photograph depicts two elderly women standing next to a car on an urban street. The setting has a vintage feel, likely dating back a few decades based on the style of clothing and the car model. The woman on the left is wearing a white and black polka-dotted dress with a cardigan, white shoes, and glasses; she has her hand partially covering her face, either shielding her eyes from the sun or possibly chuckling. The woman on the right stands more confidently, dressed in a patterned black-and-white outfit with a matching headscarf, sunglasses, large dangling earrings, and white shoes; she has her hands on her hips.

In the background, there are partially visible signs advertising a cleaners offering services such as 'Formals', 'Gowns', and 'For Better Cleaning, Finish' which suggests they might be standing in front of a dry-cleaning business. The environment captures an essence of a bustling city life with a focus on everyday scenes and personal style.
title: Elderly ladies watch as grape/lettuce boycotters march.
